title: Gekidol: Actidol Project (Gekidol)
synopsis: Five years ago, a mysterious phenomenon known as the Global Synchronic Urban Disappearance caused a large chunk of Ikebukuro to disappear overnight. Following the catastrophe, the inhabitants found themselves thrown into a state of disorder, and unexplained electromagnetic anomalies called "Auroras" began to be sighted.
characters: ['Kagami, Airi', 'Sakakibara, Kaoru', 'Asagi, Akira', 'Higuchi, Makoto', 'Morino, Seria', 'Nakamura, Mayuri', 'Takezaki, Hirokazu', 'Hinata, Tomoko', 'Yamamoto, Kazuharu', 'Doll']
